T03D3809:292b-1: a'arya pradzny'a p'a ra mi t'a sam gra ha k'a ri k'a /
T03D3809:292b-3: 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma bsdus pa'i tshig le'ur byas pa /
T03D3809:292b-4: bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma la phyag 'tshal lo //
T03D3809:292b-5: shes rab kyi pha rol phyin gnyis med //
T03D3809:292b-6: ye shes de ni de bzhin gshegs //
T03D3809:292b-7: bsgrub bya don de dang ldan pas //
T03D3809:292b-8: gzhung lam dag la de'i sgra yin //
T03D3809:292b-9: rten dang dbang du bya ba dang //
T03D3809:292b-10: las ni sgom pa dang bcas dang //
T03D3809:292b-11: rab dbye rtags dang ltung ba dang //
T03D3809:292b-12: phan yon bcas par yang dag brjod //
T03D3809:292b-13: dad ldan 'jug pa'i yan lag tu ;
T03D3809:292b-14: / ston pa dbang po 'khor dang ni //
T03D3809:292b-15: yul dus dag kyang nges bstan pa //
T03D3809:292b-16: sdud po rang nyid tshad mar ni //
T03D3809:292b-17: rab grub phyir yin 'jig rten na //
T03D3809:292b-18: yul dang dus kyis nyer mtshon zhing //
T03D3809:292b-19: dbang por bcas pa smra ba yin //
T03D3809:292b-20: smra po tshad mar rjes su rtogs //
T03D3809:292b-21: tshig phrad bdag thos la sogs pa //
T03D3809:292b-22: 'di dag thams cad zhar la ni //
T03D3809:292b-23: brjod pa yin te gtso bo'i don //
T03D3809:292b-24: sum cu rtsa gnyis de dag nyid //
T03D3809:292b-25: stong pa nyid kyi dbye ba ni //
T03D3809:292b-26: rnam pa bcu drug brgyad stong par //
T03D3809:292b-27: rim pa ji bzhin brjod pa ni //
T03D3809:292b-28: gzhan gyis bstan par shes par bya //
T03D3809:293a-2: brgyad stong 'dir don ma tshang med //
T03D3809:293a-4: don ni ji skad brjod nyid do //
T03D3809:293a-5: byang chub sems dpa' de nyid du //
T03D3809:293a-6: ngas ma mthong zhes thub pas gsungs //
T03D3809:293a-7: za po nang gi dngos rnams kyi //
T03D3809:293a-8: stong pa nyid ni de yis brjod //
T03D3809:293a-9: gzugs ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin gyis //
T03D3809:293a-10: stong pa zhes ni gsungs pa'i phyir //
T03D3809:293a-11: bza' bar bya ba phyi yi ni //
T03D3809:293a-12: skye mched rnams kyang 'dir bkag go //
T03D3809:293a-13: gzugs sogs med na de yi ni //
T03D3809:293a-14: lus gnas mtshan nyid zad pa'i don //
T03D3809:293a-15: rtogs nyid gang gis de mthong ba //
T03D3809:293a-16: de yang nang pa yin phyir med //
T03D3809:293a-17: gang phyir nang rnams stong nyid na //
T03D3809:293a-18: rang bzhin yang ni stong pa nyid //
T03D3809:293a-19: 'di ltar rnam shes rang bzhin rigs //
T03D3809:293a-20: brtse dang shes rab bdag nyid yin //
T03D3809:293a-21: sems can skye med 'gag pa yang //
T03D3809:293a-22: med ces sogs kyis sems can dang //
T03D3809:293a-23: 'khor ba dag ni stong nyid gtsor //
T03D3809:293a-24: des ni gsal bar bstan pa yin //
T03D3809:293a-25: sangs rgyas chos dang de bzhin du //
T03D3809:293a-26: byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams ni //
T03D3809:293a-27: ma mthong zhes bya la sogs kyi //
T03D3809:293a-28: stobs bcu la sogs stong par bstan //
T03D3809:293a-29: gang phyir chos rnams so sor ni //
T03D3809:293a-30: so sor brtags zhes rab brjod pa //
T03D3809:293a-31: des na chos rnams don dam du //
T03D3809:293a-32: yod min zhes byar brjod pa yin //
T03D3809:293a-33: gang phyir bdag sogs log lta ni //
T03D3809:293a-34: chen po gcod mdzad de yi phyir //
T03D3809:293a-35: bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam kun du //
T03D3809:293a-36: gang zag bdag med nyid du gsungs //
T03D3809:293a-37: chos rnams thams cad ma skyes zhes //
T03D3809:293a-38: brjod par mdzad pas de bzhin du //
T03D3809:293a-39: de nyid rig pas rnam kun du //
T03D3809:293a-40: chos kyi bdag med gsungs pa yin //
T03D3809:293a-41: kha na ma tho bcas med rnams //
T03D3809:293a-42: 'phel dang nyams pa med pa'i phyir //
T03D3809:293a-44: dge ba rnams ni bsal ba yin //
T03D3809:293a-45: dge ba rnams ni stong pa na //
T03D3809:293a-46: der rten mi zad de bzhin du //
T03D3809:293a-47: gzhag nyid de ni stong nyid kyi //
T03D3809:293a-48: rab tu dbye ba bsdus pa'o //
T03D3809:293a-49: sems kyi rnam par g-yeng ba bcus //
T03D3809:293a-50: gzhan las sems ni rnam g-yeng pas //
T03D3809:293a-51: byis pa rnams la gnyis med kyi //
T03D3809:293a-52: ye shes sgrub pa'i skal pa med //
T03D3809:293a-53: de dag phan tshun gnyen po dang //
T03D3809:293b-0: mi mthun @293b phyogs kyis bzlog pa'i phyir //
T03D3809:293b-1: shes rab pha rol phyin gzhung ste //
T03D3809:293b-2: de rnams kyang ni bsdus te bstan //
T03D3809:293b-3: ston pas phung po kun brjod pa //
T03D3809:293b-4: gzigs phyir byang sems dpa' yod ces //
T03D3809:293b-5: gang gsungs pa yis dngos med kyi //
T03D3809:293b-6: rtag pa'i g-yeng ba 'gog pa yin //
T03D3809:293b-7: 'dis ni brgyad stong la sogs su //
T03D3809:293b-8: dang po'i ngag nas brtsams nas ni //
T03D3809:293b-9: rdzogs pa'i bar ni sgrub pa yis //
T03D3809:293b-10: dngos med rtog pa dgag bya yin //
T03D3809:293b-11: 'di dag gtan tshigs ngag min te //
T03D3809:293b-12: bya ba tsam zhig smos pa yin //
T03D3809:293b-13: rigs pa tshangs pa'i dra ba sogs //
T03D3809:293b-14: mdo kun du ni shes par bya //
T03D3809:293b-15: bdag gis byang chub sems dpa' ni //
T03D3809:293b-16: ma mthong zhes sogs rgyas rnams kyi //
T03D3809:293b-17: bco ldan dngos po kun rtog gi //
T03D3809:293b-19: gang phyir ming yang ma mthong zhing //
T03D3809:293b-20: spyod yul dang ni bya ba dang //
T03D3809:293b-21: phung po kun nas de bzhin des //
T03D3809:293b-22: byang chub sems dpa' mthong ba med //
T03D3809:293b-24: de 'dra bsdus pa'i lta ba ste //
T03D3809:293b-25: shes bya nyid du blor zhugs pa'i //
T03D3809:293b-26: rnam pa thams cad brtags pa yin //
T03D3809:293b-27: shes rab pha rol phyin par ni //
T03D3809:293b-28: bstan pa gsum la yang dag brten //
T03D3809:293b-29: brtags pa dang ni gzhan dbang dang //
T03D3809:293b-30: yongs su grub pa kho na'o /
T03D3809:293b-31: med ces bya la sogs tshig gis //
T03D3809:293b-32: brtags pa thams cad 'gog pa ste //
T03D3809:293b-33: sgyu ma la sogs dpe rnams kyis //
T03D3809:293b-34: gzhan gyi dbang ni yang dag bstan //
T03D3809:293b-35: rnam par byang ba bzhi yis ni //
T03D3809:293b-36: yongs su grub pa rab tu bsgrags //
T03D3809:293b-37: shes rab pha rol phyin par ni //
T03D3809:293b-38: sangs rgyas kyis ni gzhan bstan med //
T03D3809:293b-39: kun rtog g-yeng ba rnam bcu yi //
T03D3809:293b-40: mi mthun phyogs bstan tshul la ni //
T03D3809:293b-41: gsum po bsdus dang so so ba //
T03D3809:293b-42: 'dir brjod par ni shes bya ste //
T03D3809:293b-43: dper na grub dang gzhan dbang dang //
T03D3809:293b-44: rab tu brtags pas ngag dang por //
T03D3809:293b-45: dngos po med par rang bzhin gyis //
T03D3809:293b-46: rnam par g-yeng ba sel ba bzhin //
T03D3809:293b-47: des na sangs rgyas de bzhin du //
T03D3809:293b-48: byang chub ma thob par brjod pa //
T03D3809:293b-49: yongs su rdzogs pa'i bar gyis 'dir //
T03D3809:293b-50: brtags rnams bsal bar shes par bya //
T03D3809:293b-51: ngo bos stong pa'i gzugs rnams la //
T03D3809:294a-2: de bzlog par ni shes par bya //
T03D3809:294a-3: stong nyid kyis ni mi stong zhes //
T03D3809:294a-4: bya ba'i ngag ni ston pa na //
T03D3809:294a-5: skur ba yi ni rnam rtog rnams //
T03D3809:294a-6: thams cad du ni sel bar gsungs //
T03D3809:294a-7: de bzhin sangs rgyas sgyu 'dra dang //
T03D3809:294a-8: de bzhin rmi 'dra zhes bya yang //
T03D3809:294a-9: tshul 'di nyid ni mkhas rnams kyis //
T03D3809:294a-10: ngag gzhan dag la 'ang shes par bya //
T03D3809:294a-11: gzhi mthun pa yis rgyal ba ni //
T03D3809:294a-12: sgyu ma lta bur rab brjod cing //
T03D3809:294a-13: sgyu ma lta bu la sogs pa'i //
T03D3809:294a-14: sgra rnams kyis kyang gzhan dbang brjod //
T03D3809:294a-15: so so'i skye bo'i shes pa gang //
T03D3809:294a-16: rang bzhin gyis ni rnam byang ba //
T03D3809:294a-17: de la sangs rgyas sgra brjod de //
T03D3809:294a-18: byang chub sems dpa' la rgyal bzhin //
T03D3809:294a-19: ma rig pas ni dbang byas te //
T03D3809:294a-20: rang gi rang bzhin rab bsgribs nas //
T03D3809:294a-21: sgyu ma lta bur gzhan du snang //
T03D3809:294a-22: 'bras bu rmi lam bzhin du spong //
T03D3809:294a-23: gnyis med gzhan du snang ba na //
T03D3809:294a-24: 'bras bu la yang skur rnams kyi //
T03D3809:294a-25: skur ba'i rnam par rtog rnams la //
T03D3809:294a-26: skur par byed par 'di dag brjod //
T03D3809:294a-27: phan tshun du ni 'gal ba'i phyir //
T03D3809:294a-28: gzugs ni stong nyid yin mi rigs //
T03D3809:294a-29: stong nyid rang bzhin med nyid la //
T03D3809:294a-30: gzugs ni rnam pa dang 'brel ba //
T03D3809:294a-31: des na gcig tu rnam rtog la //
T03D3809:294a-32: gnod 'gyur gzugs de stong nyid las //
T03D3809:294a-33: ji lta bur yang gzhan min pas //
T03D3809:294a-34: tha dad kyi ni rnam rtog 'gog / gang phyir ma rig pas sprul pa //
T03D3809:294a-35: de ni med pa kho na snang //
T03D3809:294a-36: med pa ston par zhus pa na //
T03D3809:294a-37: de ni ma rig ces brjod do //
T03D3809:294a-38: rang bzhin de nyid shes rab kyi //
T03D3809:294a-39: pha rol phyin pa zhes kyang brjod //
T03D3809:294a-40: gnyis 'di nyid ni gnyis med pa//
T03D3809:294a-41: rnam rtog gnyis la gnod byed yin //
T03D3809:294a-42: rigs pa yang gsung rnam dag ming tsam de nyid du //
T03D3809:294a-43: rang gi ngo bo yod min pas //
T03D3809:294a-45: tha dad nyid kyang mthong ba yin //
T03D3809:294a-46: gzugs 'di ming tsam de nyid du //
T03D3809:294a-47: rang gi ngo bo yod min pas //
T03D3809:294a-48: des na ngo bo nyid du ni //
T03D3809:294a-49: rnam rtog rnams kyi go skabs bsal //
T03D3809:294a-50: gzugs ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin gyis //
T03D3809:294a-51: stong pa sngar brjod gang yin pa //
T03D3809:294a-52: de ni rang gi ngo bo yis //
T03D3809:294a-54: chos rnams kyi ni skye ba dang //
T03D3809:294a-55: 'gag pa mthong ba med ces gang //
T03D3809:294a-56: bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa nges //
T03D3809:294b-0: @294b de yi khyad par rnam rtog bsal //
T03D3809:294b-1: gang phyir ming bcos brjod bya yi //
T03D3809:294b-2: chos de dag kyang brtags yin pas //
T03D3809:294b-3: sgra don dag gi 'brel pa ni //
T03D3809:294b-4: ngo bo nyid du des mi bzhed //
T03D3809:294b-5: byis pa'i phyi rol don du ni //
T03D3809:294b-6: mngon zhen 'khrul pas spyad pa yin //
T03D3809:294b-7: tha snyad 'di yang de bzhin te //
T03D3809:294b-10: des 'dir ji ltar ming bya ba //
T03D3809:294b-11: de ltar brjod bya'i dngos po de //
T03D3809:294b-12: yod min dang phyir ming ji bzhin //
T03D3809:294b-13: don du rtog pa 'dod ma yin //
T03D3809:294b-14: bden don rnam rtog sel ba na //
T03D3809:294b-15: shes rab pha rol phyin pa dang //
T03D3809:294b-16: sangs rgyas de bzhin byang sems dpa' //
T03D3809:294b-17: ming tsam zhes ni rab tu gsungs //
T03D3809:294b-19: dngos po sel bar byed pa min //
T03D3809:294b-20: de bzhin du ni ngag gzhan la'ang //
T03D3809:294b-21: don rnams nges par shes par bya //
T03D3809:294b-22: de nyid rig pas ming rnams kun //
T03D3809:294b-23: don ji lta bar yang dag tu //
T03D3809:294b-24: dmigs pa med nyid de yi phyir //
T03D3809:294b-25: sgra 'di zlog par byed ma yin //
T03D3809:294b-26: rab 'byor gyis ni sgra dang sgra'i //
T03D3809:294b-27: don nyid gnyi ga 'gog pa na //
T03D3809:294b-28: de yis byang chub sems dpa'i ming //
T03D3809:294b-29: ma mthong zhes ni brjod par 'gyur //
T03D3809:294b-30: shes rab pha rol phyin ngag gang //
T03D3809:294b-31: 'di tsam gyis rtogs min pa med //
T03D3809:294b-33: rnams kyis zhi ba mo'i blo yis dpyod //
T03D3809:294b-34: skabs kyi don ni spong ba dang //
T03D3809:294b-35: don gzhan rtog pa gang yin pa //
T03D3809:294b-36: de ni shes rab pha rol tu //
T03D3809:294b-37: phyin par gzugs brnyan yin par 'dod //
T03D3809:294b-38: shes rab pha rol phyin rten can //
T03D3809:294b-39: bsdus don 'di tsam nyid yin te //
T03D3809:294b-40: slar yang don gzhan la brten nas //
T03D3809:294b-41: don de nyid ni bzlas ba yin //
T03D3809:294b-42: shes rab pha rol phyin ma ni //
T03D3809:294b-43: brgyad stong yang dag bsdus pa yi //
T03D3809:294b-44: bsod nams thob gang des skye bo //
T03D3809:294b-45: shes rab pha rol phyin gyur cig /'phags pa shes
T03D3809:294b-46: rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma bsdus pa'i tshig
T03D3809:294b-47: le'ur byas pa / slob dpon phyogs kyi glang po'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T03D3809:294b-49: // / kha che'i pandi ta ti la ka ka la sha dang /
